name: Starmie
description: The Mysterious Pokémon. The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in seven colors.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: This Pokémon knows the Light cantrip and can cast it at will.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: After this Pokémon misses an attack, its next attack is done at advantage.
